Module.Content:
<script type='text/javascript'>
    			window.steal = { env: "production", loadDev: false }
    		</script>

  			<script type="text/javascript" src="https://raw.github.com/bitovi/steal/master/steal.production.js"></script>

  			<script type='text/javascript'>
    			steal.executed("app/production.css");
    		</script>

			<script type="text/javascript" src="https://raw.github.com/amcdaniel2/opensocial/master/lib/app/production.js"></script>
			<link href="https://raw.github.com/amcdaniel2/opensocial/master/lib/app/production.css" media="screen" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />

			<script type="text/javascript">
				gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(function(){
					steal('app', function(){
						debugger;
	    				new OpenSocial(document.body, opensocial.data.getDataContext().getDataSet('org.opensocial.ee.context'));
    				});
				});
    		</script>
